question: Do you currently use any kind of water filter at home?
If you use a filter, do you regularly change the filter cartridge?
Do you regularly boil water before drinking?
Do you use Kettle/Stove/Microwave/Instant Boiling Unit to boil water?
Do you use a water distillation unit?
Have you recently changed the plumbing material (i.e., pipes) in your property?
Do you run the taps before you drink from them?
Do you avoid iodized salt when cooking?
Do you use bleach when cleaning?
Do you ventilate after showering (e.g. extractor fan or open window)?
Do you regularly take long showers?
Do you ventilate when cleaning (e.g., open a window)?
Do you refrigerate water before drinking?
Do you use a clay jug to store water before drinking?
Do you pour, stir or shake water before drinking?
